item.description:
Agenda for the meeting:

1.) Primary focus of the meeting will be dialogue. You might want to consider the following questions: What makes good, realistic dialogue?
What strategies do you use to find a character's voice?
How much dialogue is necessary to a text?
Where is dialogue needed?
When is dialogue most affective?

2.) Two writers have volunteered to bring writing for us to discuss. Both Jessie and Bill have posted their work for us to discuss.

Looking forward to some good discussion and I'm currently on the hunt for a good, productive working space for our meetups.

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there trying to save seats and reading
item.name: A Delightful Discussion about Dialogue and Other Such Things
